name: Galactic Clapback
description:
Mobile bullet hell where the player must dodge and parry the enemy spaceships. The main objective is to get the highest scores which exchange into in-game currency allowing players to purchase more unique ships. 
Use WASD or Game Joy Stick to move.

Spacebar to parry.

WebGL version does not keep score. Download Unity Build for to get the best performance and data saving.
